document.full_text: after a rambling speech from colonel qaddafi on state television on saturday in which he insisted that his forces were not killing civilians, evidence to the contrary was found in misurata.
document.title: shell in misurata adds to a city's grim toll
lines_and_colors: after a rambling speech from colonel qaddafi on state television on saturday in which he insisted that his forces were not killing civilians, evidence to the contrary was found in misurata.
